original_title: Tarja Turunen & Mike Terrana - Beauty & The Beat
overview: Beauty and the Beat is a live collaboration between Tarja & Mike Terrana. The track listing consists in a mix of classical pieces, covers from both Queen and Led Zeppelin, from her past band Nightwish, and Tarja's own songs.
title: Tarja Turunen & Mike Terrana - Beauty & The Beat
